docs.text:
Welcome to methylpy_via_bismark


About


The bismark pipeline and the methylpy pipeline both create the same kind of methylation data but in a slightly different format.  methylpy_via_bismark can help convert bismark data to methylpy's 
allc
 format. 


Requirements




awk


methylation counts file obtained from coverage2cytosine
